Text:
thank you for your job again
will you post the basho in HQ?
hope to see you next basho
I will Upload the Basho HQ soon.  as always, I continue to seed until the next one.  This has been one of my favourite Honbasho in quite some time!
As always, THANK YOU for your efforts.  They are greatly appreciated.  I watched a couple of days online, but always enjoy to English commentary.  I agree that this was a very enjoyable Basho...
